\newcommand\lr[1]{\multicolumn{1}{|@{\hspace{.6ex}}c@{\hspace{.6ex}}|}{\raisebox{-.3ex}{$#1$}}}
\newcommand\llll[1]{\multicolumn{1}{|@{\hspace{.6ex}}c@{\hspace{.6ex}}}{\raisebox{-.3ex}{$#1$}}}
\newcommand\hide[1]{}
\newcommand\unhide[1]{#1}
\newcommand{\TmodXvw}[3]{#1 \backslash\mkern-6mu\backslash (#2)^{ss}_{#1}(#3)}
\newcommand\MFb{\mathfrak{b}}
\newcommand\MFt{\mathfrak{t}}
\newcommand\MFw{\mathfrak{w}}
\newcommand\IR{\mathbb{R}}
\newcommand\IN{\mathbb{N}}
\newcommand\IZ{\mathbb{Z}}
\newcommand\IC{\mathbb{C}}
\newcommand\IQ{\mathbb{Q}}
\newcommand\IF{\mathbb{F}}
\newcommand\SL{\mathscr{L}}
\newcommand\SF{\mathscr{F}}
\newcommand\SC{\mathscr{C}}
\newcommand\SH{\mathscr{H}}
\newcommand\SB{\mathscr{B}}
\newcommand\SP{\mathscr{P}}
\newcommand\POWSET{\SP}%power set symbol
\newcommand\BF{\textbf}
\newcommand\IT{\textit}
\newcommand\UL{\underline}
\newcommand\DUL{\underline\underline}
\newcommand\OL[1]{$\overline{\mbox{#1}}$}
\newcommand\ITBF[1]{\textbf{\textit{#1}}}
\newcommand\ITUL[1]{\underline{\textit{#1}}}
\newcommand\BFUL[1]{\textbf{\underline{#1}}}
\newcommand\ITBFUL[1]{\textbf{\textit{\underline{#1}}}}
\newcommand\VEC{\bm}
\newcommand\GIVEN{\mid}%for conditional probabilities
\newcommand\UNI{u}%symbol for uniform random smapeling
\newcommand\DEF{:=}
\newcommand{\grass}[2]{G_{{#1},{#2}}}
%\newcommand{\sslash}{\mathbin{/\mkern-6mu/}}
\newcommand{\taumn}[2]{w_{#1,#2}}
\newcommand{\gmodp}{G/P}
\newcommand{\Qgmodp}[1]{T \backslash\mkern-6mu\backslash (\gmodp)^{ss}_T{#1}}
\newcommand{\gmodq}{G/Q}
\newcommand{\gmnmodt}[2]{T \backslash\mkern-6mu\backslash (\grass{#1}{#2})^{ss}_T}
\newcommand{\Lgmnmodt}[3]{T \backslash\mkern-6mu\backslash (\grass{#1}{#2})^{ss}_T{#3}}
\newcommand{\xtaumodt}[2]{T\backslash\mkern-6mu\backslash X(\taumn{#1}{#2})}
\newcommand{\schbmodt}[1]{T\backslash\mkern-6mu\backslash X(#1)}
\newcommand{\VmodG}{G \backslash\mkern-6mu\backslash {\mathbb P}(V)^{ss}_G}
\newcommand{\XmodG}{G \backslash\mkern-6mu\backslash X^{ss}_G}
\newcommand{\LXmodT}[1]{T \backslash\mkern-6mu\backslash X^{ss}_T(#1)}
\newcommand{\LXmodG}[1]{G \backslash\mkern-6mu\backslash X^{ss}_G(#1)}
\newcommand{\LXWmodT}[2]{T \backslash\mkern-6mu\backslash X(#1)^{ss}_T(#2)}
\newcommand{\SLmodp}{SL(5,\mathbb{C})/P}
\newcommand{\SLmodq}{SL(5,\mathbb{C})/Q}
\newcommand{\nSLmodp}{SL(n,\mathbb{C})/P}
\newcommand{\nSLmodq}{SL(n,\mathbb{C})/Q}
\newcommand{\flvmodt}{T \backslash\mkern-6mu\backslash (\SLmodq)^{ss}_T}
\newcommand{\nflvmodt}{T \backslash\mkern-6mu\backslash (\nSLmodq)^{ss}_T}
\newcommand{\Lflvmodt}[1]{\flvmodt {\cal L}(#1)}
\newcommand{\SLnmodp}{SL(n,\mathbb{C})/P}
\newcommand{\flvnmodt}{T \backslash\mkern-6mu\backslash (\SLnmodp)^{ss}_T}
